bill.title: Vessels; Custody and Disposition
bill.description: Clarifies responsibility for disposing of vessels and amends the description of an abandoned vessel. Effective July 1, 2012. (HB2589 CD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to WLO, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 7
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by WLO on Monday, 01-30-12 9:15AM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on WLO recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Har, Coffman, Herkes, Ito, Kawakami, Nakashima, Riviere, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Carroll.
(H) Reported from WLO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 67-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Awana excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-07-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.
(H) The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-14-12.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-14-12 2:05PM in conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Carroll, Coffman.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 648-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
(H) Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes, Kawakami, M. Lee, Mizuno, Morikawa excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-29-12 1:30PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 871-12), recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 254).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to WLH/JDL, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WLH/JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-20-12 12:30PM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on WLH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WLH were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Solomon, Ryan, Shimabukuro, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Slom.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara, Slom.
(S) Reported from WLH/JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2947) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-29-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kouchi.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3356) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 639) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 547).
(H) House conferees appointed: Chang, Rhoads, Har Co-Chairs; McKelvey, Riviere.
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Dela Cruz, Chair; Solomon, Hee, Kidani, Co-Chair(s); Slom.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 754).
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 612).
(H) Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-24-12 3:45PM in conference room 224.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-26-12 2:10PM in conference room 224.

(H) The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Rhoads, Har, McKelvey, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

(S) The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Hee, Kidani; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Solomon, Slom.
(H) Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 43-12) as amended in (CD 1).
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-01-12.
(S) Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 43-12).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-01-12.
(S) Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
(H) Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with Representative(s) Fontaine voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
(H) Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 831).
(S) Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 720).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
